chat_message.portable_blueprints.contain: <Containers Blueprint> The container at coordinates %v% has been successfully linked!
<Containers Blueprint> The container at coordinates %v% has been unlinked!
chat_message.portable_blueprints.global_: <Portable Blueprints> The blueprint "%v%" has been successfully exported to the mod's local storage. You can now use it in other worlds or export another one!
<Portable Blueprints> The blueprint "%v%" is being exported from world files to the mod's local storage. DO NOT LEAVE THE WORLD until the process is complete, or it will be canceled!
<Portable Blueprints> This blueprint exceeds the block limit allowed in this world!
<Portable Blueprints> You've reached the maximum number of blueprints! Remove one using the tablet to add a new one.
chat_message.portable_blueprints.server_: <Portable Blueprints> The blueprint "%v%" has been successfully imported to the world files. You can now use it in the world!
<Portable Blueprints> The blueprint "%v%" is being imported from the mod's local storage to world files. DO NOT LEAVE THE WORLD until the process is complete, or it will be canceled!
command.portable_blueprints.blueprintser: <Server Blueprints> An error occurred while deleting the server blueprint!
<Server Blueprints> You must hold a blueprint item in your main hand.
<Server Blueprints> Global blueprints cannot be added to the server collection.
<Server Blueprints> Failed to update player permission!
<Server Blueprints> Blueprint successfully added to the server collection.
command.portable_blueprints.blueprintwor: <Worn Blueprints> An error occurred while deleting the worn blueprint!
<Worn Blueprints> You must hold a blueprint item in your main hand.
<Worn Blueprints> Global blueprints cannot be added to the worn collection.
<Worn Blueprints> Blueprint successfully added to the worn collection.
gui.portable_blueprints.blueprint.blackl: [This block is not allowed on this server]
gui.portable_blueprints.blueprint.button: Only builds the structure once all required blocks are available.
Skips blocks that cannot be placed because their positions are already occupied by other blocks
gui.portable_blueprints.compatibility.pr: You don't have enough EMC for item "%v%"
Not all items%n%have EMC!%n%Therefore,%n%they will%n%be taken from%n%the inventory!
gui.portable_blueprints.scanner.checkbox: Includes in the scan vanilla blocks that%n%are only obtainable in Creative mode.
gui.portable_blueprints.scanner.title_ma: %n%Maximum blueprint limit reached!%n%[Max: %v%]%n%Please make room via tablet%n%to add more
gui.portable_blueprints.scanner.title_re: Do you want to replace%n%the existing blueprint?
gui.portable_blueprints.tablet.overlay_t: A blueprint with this name already%n%exists, choose an option with%n%which you want to proceed
hotbar_message.portable_blueprints.block: Some blocks in the world are obstructing the construction. %v% highlighted blocks need to be removed. Once cleared, reset the origin and try building again.
item.portable_blueprints.description.blu: Right-click a block to set the blueprint origin.%n%Right-click in the air to open the blueprint menu.%n%Hold Shift + Right-click a container block to select it as a storage.%n%Hold CTRL and look at one of the 6 faces; once the desired face is highlighted, use the mouse wheel to move it closer or farther.%n%Hold Shift + Mouse wheel to adjust the hologram transparency.
item.portable_blueprints.description.sca: Right-click a block to set the first corner.%n%Right-click another block after setting the first corner to set the second corner.%n%Right-click in the air after setting both corners to open the menu.%n%CTRL + Mouse Wheel to set the selection distance%n%Shift + Right-Click in the air to remove the selected corners%n%Hold CTRL and look at one of the 6 faces, when the desired face is highlighted, use the mouse wheel to expand the area towards or away from you
tab.portable_blueprints.title: Portable blueprints
